name.japanese: 人生バラ色ライダーズ

description: Formerly known as the Flying Fish Riders, this crew was rebranded by their leader Duval after Sanji's kicks transformed his face. The crew operates in the waters near Sabaody Archipelago using flying fish as transportation. After becoming allies with the Straw Hats, they offer their assistance whenever needed.

keyMoments.title: Rebranding from Flying Fish Riders to Rosy Life Riders
keyMoments.description: Duval announces the crew's new name, the Rosy Life Riders, reflecting their new positive outlook on life after Duval's transformation. They offer their Den Den Mushi number to the Straw Hats for future assistance.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the transformation of the crew from antagonists to allies of the Straw Hat Pirates.

statusHistory.reason: Crew is rebranded and becomes active allies of the Straw Hats

reveals.information: The Rosy Life Riders become allies of the Straw Hat Pirates and offer their assistance
The Flying Fish Riders are renamed to the Rosy Life Riders
